Species¶

A Species object represents a ChEDL property package based on ideal mixture.

class biosteam.Species(*IDs, cls=None)[source]¶

Create Species object that contains Compound objects as attributes.

Parameters
*IDsstr
Strings should be one of the following [-]:

  • Name, in IUPAC form or common form or a synonym registered in PubChem

  • InChI name, prefixed by ‘InChI=1S/’ or ‘InChI=1/’

  • InChI key, prefixed by ‘InChIKey=’

  • PubChem CID, prefixed by ‘PubChem=’

  • SMILES (prefix with ‘SMILES=’ to ensure smiles parsing)

  • CAS number

cls=Nonetype Compound, defaults to biosteam.Chemical

The type of objects that will be created and stored as attributes.

classmethod tospecies(compounds)[source]¶

Return a Species object from an iterable of Compound objects.

extend(self, compounds)[source]¶

Extend species object with more compounds.

getprops(self, IDs, prop_ID, T, P, phase)[source]¶

Return list of the desired property, prop_ID, for each compound in IDz.

setprops(self, IDs, prop_ID, new_values)[source]¶

Set new values to compound property, prop_ID, for given IDs.
